simpledb

Class TestUtil.MockScan

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.TestUtil.MockScan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbIterator
    Enclosing class:
    TestUtil

    public static class TestUtil.MockScan
extends java.lang.Object
implements DbIterator
    Mock SeqScan class for unit testing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MockScan(int low, int high, int width)
      Creates a fake SeqScan that returns tuples sequentially with 'width' fields, each with the same value, that increases from low (inclusive) and high (exclusive) over getNext calls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Closes the iterator.

      Returns the TupleDesc associated with this DbIterator.

      Returns true if the iterator has more tuples.
      Tuple next()
      Returns the next tuple from the operator (typically implementing by reading from a child operator or an access method).
      void open()
      Opens the iterator.
      void rewind()
      Resets the iterator to the start.
